title: Pattersontech
author: Pattersontech
content: Have you been searching for a easy way to get verified on Facebook or Instagram? I'm here to help you realize your dreams. I can help you get verified on Instagram or Facebook in less than 20. I use my connections to 3 moderators in Facebook and Instagram to get you verified. I also guarantee the blue tick will be permanent. Full refund if i fail to get your brand or profile verified. I accept all categories including :     News Media    Government accounts    Sports    Music    Fashion    Cryptocurrency    Investment    Entertainment    Digital Creator/Blogger/Influencer    Gamer    Business/Brand/OrganisationDisclosure of my clients will never happen. Neither will i tell you whom verified my clients, neither we’ll tell anyone about you. Its a vice-versa thing and our first main policy! Don't expect me to send samples or pictures.. It strictly confidential. Only get in touch with me if you interested and don’t want to waste your time and ours. " Time is Money, and my team is full of enthusiasts who want to just work and earn "Below are some of my requirements:    Account username    Other social media network links ( Twitter, Snapchat, TikTok etc )    Website (optional)    Wikipedia ( optional )    A brief description about you.COST AND TURN AROUND TIME PRICE :<INSTAGRAM - $4000FACEBOOK - $3000Payment via BTCBTCBTCBTCBTC TAT - 20 DAYS ONLY CONTACT Email : Digitalpatterson@gmail.comGet in touch with me to order.

comments.author: Pattersontech
comments.body: Twitter Profile Verification - BLUE TICK now available.Contact me for more details.Thank you
